text: kah do, "aao, main tumhen sunaoon ki tumhaare rab ne tumhaare oopar kya paabandiyaan lagaee hai: yah ki kisee cheez ko usaka saajheedaar na thaharao aur maan-baap ke saath sadvy vahaar karo aur nirdhanata ke kaaran apanee santaan kee hatya na karo; ham tumhen bhee rozee dete hai aur unhen bhee. aur ashleel baaton ke nikat na jao, chaahe ve khulee huee hon ya chhipee huee ho. aur kisee jeev kee, jise allaah ne aadaraneey thaharaaya hai, hatya na karo. yah aur baat hai ki haq ke lie aisa karana pade. ye baate hai, jinakee taakeed usane tumhen kee hai, shaayad ki tum buddhi se kaam lo.
